orig_text: Point out a special enemy using the "shout out" command.
tran_text: 使用喊叫以標示特殊敵人。

orig_text: Wait, I'm not dead yet! I
Revive or uncuff any teammate ##revive## times.
tran_text: 救起或釋放隊友 ##revive## 次。

orig_text: ...and that's a lot of cash V
Defeat four Law enforcers with a single Trip Mine.
tran_text: 用同一個詭雷擊敗四個執法人員

orig_text: Beat a heist after having been the only one alive. (4 teammates).
tran_text: 在四個人的隊伍中，以身為最後一個生存者的狀態通過劫案。

orig_text: ...and that's a lot of cash I
Using the Reinbeck 880, defeat ##reinbeck_spooc_kill## Cloakers. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
tran_text: 使用 Reinbeck 880 ，殺死 ##reinbeck_spooc_kill## 個 Cloakers ，使用近戰並不會計算在內！

orig_text: Using the Brenner 21, defeat ##hk21_law_head_shot## Law enforcers with headshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
tran_text: 使用 Brenner 21 爆頭並擊敗執法人員 ##hk21_law_head_shot## 次。使用近戰武器在此挑戰中並不會被計算！

orig_text: Beat SLAUGHTERHOUSE within 15 minutes, taking all the gold. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
tran_text: 在15分鐘內通關屠宰場，並拿走所有黃金，要完成這項挑戰，你必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: Complete Slaughterhouse on OVERKILL difficulty without anyone getting traded from custody.
tran_text: 沒有人被交易下完成 OVERKILL 難度下的屠宰場。

orig_text: Defeat ##tank_kill## Bulldozers.  Using Trip Mines or Melee does not count towards this challenge!
tran_text: 殺死 ##tank_kill## 個 Bulldozer 。使用詭雷或是近戰武器在此挑戰中並不會被計算！

orig_text: Stay inside THE MAIN ROOM in SLAUGHTERHOUSE for an hour or more. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
tran_text: 留在屠宰場的主房間一小時或以上，要完成這項挑戰，你必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: Using the Compact-5, defeat ##mp5_law_head_shot## Law enforcers with headshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
tran_text: 使用 Compact-5 爆頭殺死 ##mp5_law_head_shot## 個執法人員，使用近戰並不會計算在內！

orig_text: Defeat a Bulldozer with a shotgun.
tran_text: 使用霰彈槍擊敗一個 Bulldozer 。

orig_text: Get a Heavy SWAT to give up.
tran_text: 有一個重裝 SWAT 認輸。

orig_text: ...and that's a lot of cash IX
Defeat ##law_kill## Law enforcers.  Using Trip Mines or Melee does not count towards this challenge!
tran_text: 殺死 ##law_kill## 個執法人員。使用詭雷或是近戰武器在此挑戰中並不會被計算！

orig_text: Beat HEAT STREET on OVERKILL difficulty, with your group accuracy being at 60% or higher. To complete this challenge, everyone in your crew will have to have played the heist from the start.
tran_text: 在 OVERKILL 難度下，你隊伍準確度有六成或以上時完成熱火街道，要完成這項挑戰，你的隊伍必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: Beat all original heists on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty and show them all you are on top! Completing this will make you golden!
tran_text: 在 OVERKILL 145+ 難度下完成所有原版劫案以顯示你是最強的！完成這個會令你變得黃金！

tran_text: 在戰慄空間中，亮出武器的 60 秒內殺死所有有裝備的黑幫，要完成這項挑戰，你必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: Defeat ##swat_kill## blue SWAT. Using Trip Mines or Melee does not count towards this challenge!
tran_text: 殺死 ##swat_kill## 個藍衣 SWAT. ，使用詭雷或近戰並不會計算在內！

orig_text: Using the Mark 11, defeat ##mac11_law_head_shot## Law enforcers with headshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
tran_text: 使用 Mark 11 ，爆頭殺死 ##mac11_law_head_shot## 個條子，使用近戰並不會計算在內！

orig_text: Complete Panic Room on hard difficulty without being taken into custody.
tran_text: 沒被扣留下完成 hard 難度的戰慄空間。

orig_text: I've fallen - and I can't get up!
tran_text: 我掉下來了－而且不能起來！

orig_text: Complete Green Bridge on OVERKILL difficulty.
tran_text: 在 OVERKILL 難度下完成格林大橋

orig_text: Force ##tiedown_fbi## FBI agents to cuff themselves.
Complete Panic Room on OVERKILL difficulty without anyone getting traded from custody.
tran_text: 沒有人被交易下完成 OVERKILL 難度下的戰慄空間。

orig_text: Force ##tiedown_smep## HEAVY SWATS to cuff themselves.
tran_text: 逼 ##tiedown_smep## 重裝 SWAT 自縛。

orig_text: Defeat a law enforcer planting C4 in FIRST WORLD BANK on hard difficulty or above. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
tran_text: 在 hard 或以上的難度下的世界第一銀行，放置 C4 時殺死一個條子，要完成這項挑戰，你必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: Using the Locomotive 12G, defeat ##mossberg_law_kill## Law enforcers. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
tran_text: 使用 Locomotive 12G ，殺死 ##mossberg_law_kill## 個條子，使用近戰並不會計算在內！

orig_text: Using the B9-S, defeat ##beretta92_law_kill## Law enforcers. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
tran_text: 使用 B9-S ，殺死 ##beretta92_law_kill## 個條子，使用近戰並不會計算在內！

orig_text: Using the Bronco .44, defeat ##bronco_law_head_shot## Law enforcers with headshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
tran_text: 使用 Bronco .44 ，爆頭殺死 ##bronco_law_head_shot## 個條子，使用近戰並不會計算在內！

orig_text: Using the Bronco .44, defeat ##bronco_tank_kill## bulldozers. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
tran_text: 使用 Bronco .44 ，殺死 ##bronco_tank_kill## 個 Bulldozer，使用近戰並不會計算在內！

orig_text: Using the Brenner 21, defeat ##hk21_shield_kill## Shields. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
tran_text: Using the Brenner 21, defeat ##hk21_shield_kill## Shields. 使用近戰並不會計算在內！

orig_text: Four guys went on a Trip
Defeat ##bleed_out_kill## Law enforcers while you're in bleedout. Using Trip Mines or Sentry Gun does not count towards this challenge!
tran_text: 在倒地時殺死 ##bleed_out_kill## 個條子，使用詭雷或步哨槍並不會計算在內！

orig_text: Defeat ##bleed_out_multikill## Law enforcers during a single bleedout.
tran_text: 在一次倒地中殺死 ##bleed_out_multikill## 個條子。

orig_text: Get revived by one of your crew mates.
tran_text: 被你的其中一個隊友救起。

orig_text: Force ##tiedown_cop## Police officers to cuff themselves.
...and that's a lot of cash VI
First World Bank: Like a pro
Complete First World Bank on OVERKILL difficulty without anyone getting traded from custody.
tran_text: 沒有人被交易下完成 OVERKILL 難度下的世界第一銀行。

orig_text: Complete Heat Street on hard difficulty without killing any civilians.
tran_text: 沒殺平民下完成 hard 難度的熱火街頭。

orig_text: Complete Heat Street on hard difficulty without going into bleedout.
tran_text: 沒在倒地下完成 hard 難度的熱火街頭。

orig_text: Complete Green Bridge on hard difficulty without going into bleedout.
tran_text: 沒在倒地下完成 hard 難度的格林大橋。

orig_text: Complete Panic Room on hard difficulty without going into bleedout.
tran_text: 沒在倒地下完成 hard 難度的戰慄空間。

orig_text: Complete Slaughterhouse on hard difficulty without going into bleedout.
tran_text: 沒在倒地下完成 hard 難度的屠宰場。

orig_text: Finish a heist in custody while all your team mates are alive. (4 teammates).
tran_text: 當其他隊友生還而自己被扣留時完成劫案。 (4 名隊員)

orig_text: Trade all the butchers in SLAUGHTERHOUSE.
tran_text: 在屠宰場交易所有層夫。

orig_text: Get the armored car to drop without shooting at it in SLAUGHTERHOUSE. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
tran_text: 在屠宰場中沒有射擊就令裝甲車掉下，要完成這項挑戰，你必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: Find ten money bundles in PANIC ROOM.
tran_text: 在戰慄空間找到十包錢包。

orig_text: In PANIC ROOM, take the key from Chavez within the first 45 seconds of starting the mission. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
tran_text: 在戰慄空間，開始四十秒內拿到 Chavez 的鑰匙，要完成這項挑戰，你必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: Destroy all the cameras in FIRST WORLD BANK within 10 seconds of drawing your weapons. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
tran_text: 在世界第一銀行中亮出武器的十秒內破壞所有攝像頭，要完成這項挑戰，你必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: Don't let any law enforcers reach the graffiti on the center of the roof in PANIC ROOM from the SECURE THE ROOF objective until the ESCAPE objective on hard or OVERKILL difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
tran_text: 在 hard 或 OVERKILL 難度下的戰慄空間，獲得天台至撤離時期，不要讓任何條子到達天台中央的塗鴉，要完成這項挑戰，你必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: Defeat 25 FBI agents in a row.
tran_text: 連續殺死 25 FBI 探員。

orig_text: In DIAMOND HEIST, defeat all twelve Patrol Guards using only trip mines. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
tran_text: 在鑽石劫掠中，只使用詭雷殺死所有十二個警衛，要完成這項挑戰，你必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: Complete the GREEN BRIDGE on hard or OVERKILL difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
tran_text: 在 hard 或者 OVERKILL 下完成格林大橋，要完成這項挑戰，你必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: In DIAMOND HEIST, get Bain to come back for you at least 7 times on hard or OVERKILL difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
tran_text: 在 hard 或 OVERKILL 難度下的鑽石劫掠， Bain 最少來接了你七次，要完成這項挑戰，你必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: In DIAMOND HEIST, get the big diamond and escape on OVERKILL difficulty with you and all your team mates alive. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
tran_text: 在 OVERKILL 的難度下，你和隊友都在鑽石劫掠中生還及拿到鑽石撤離，要完成這項挑戰，你必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: Beat any heist on OVERKILL difficulty with three other players who are all using the Noob Lube perk. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
tran_text: 在 OVERKILL 下，帶住三個使用菜鳥天賦的玩家完成任一劫案，要完成這項挑戰，你必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: Gain a level in the Assault tree during an assault.
tran_text: 在突擊時在突擊兵技能樹中升級。

orig_text: Gain a level in the Sharpshooter tree with your last kill being a Sniper.
tran_text: 殺死狙擊手後精準射手升級。

orig_text: Gain a level in the Support tree while reviving a teammate.
tran_text: 當救起隊友時支援兵升級。

orig_text: STRYK VS. the Law Headshot III
AK VS. the Law Headshot I
AK VS. the Law Headshot II
AK VS. the Law Headshot IV
SENTRY GUN VS. the Law I
SENTRY GUN VS. the Law III
SENTRY GUN VS. the Law IV
SENTRY GUN VS. the Law V
SENTRY GUN VS. the Law VI
SENTRY GUN Kills in a Row II
SENTRY GUN Kills in a Row III
Using the AK, defeat ##ak47_law_head_shot## Law enforcers with headshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
tran_text: 使用 AK ，爆頭殺死 ##ak47_law_head_shot## 個條子，使用近戰並不會計算在內！

orig_text: Using the GL40, defeat ##m79_law_head_shot## Law enforcers with headshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
tran_text: 使用 GL40 ，爆頭殺死 ##m79_law_head_shot## 個條子，使用近戰並不會計算在內！

orig_text: Using the STRYK, defeat ##glock_shield_body_shot## Shields with bodyshots. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
tran_text: 使用 STRYK ，殺死 ##glock_shield_body_shot## 個 Shields ，使用近戰並不會計算在內！

orig_text: Using the AK, defeat ##ak47_taser_kill## Tasers. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
tran_text: 使用 AK ，殺死 ##ak47_taser_kill## 個 Taser，使用近戰並不會計算在內！

orig_text: Using the SENTRY GUN, defeat ##sentry_gun_law_kill## Law enforcers.
tran_text: 使用步哨槍，殺死 ##sentry_gun_law_kill## 個條子。

orig_text: Be in a team that places four Sentry Guns during a heist.
tran_text: 在一場劫案中一隊放下了四個步哨槍。

orig_text: Using the GL40, defeat ##m79_simultaneous_specials## Special Units simultaneously.
tran_text: 使用 GL40 ，同時殺死 ##m79_simultaneous_specials## 個特殊部隊。

orig_text: Complete UNDERCOVER on OVERKILL difficulty without anyone getting traded from custody.
tran_text: 沒有人被交易下完成 OVERKILL 難度下的骯髒交易。
在 OVERKILL 145+ 難度下完成骯髒交易，要完成這項挑戰，你必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: In for a Dime, In for a Dollar
Complete COUNTERFEIT on hard difficulty without killing any civilians.
tran_text: 沒殺平民下完成 hard 難度的偽鈔風雲。

orig_text: Complete COUNTERFEIT on OVERKILL difficulty without anyone getting traded from custody.
tran_text: 沒有人被交易下完成 OVERKILL 難度下的偽鈔風雲。

orig_text: Beat UNDERCOVER with everyone in the crew only using the GL40. To complete this challenge, everyone in your crew will have to have played the heist from the start. Using Melee does not count towards this challenge!
tran_text: 整個隊伍只使用 GL40 下完成骯髒交易，要完成這項挑戰，你的隊伍必須從頭至尾都在場上。使用近戰並不會計算在內！

orig_text: Beat any heist using the STRYK Pistol, AK Rifle, GL40 Grenade Launcher, Toolkit upgrade, Sentry Gun equipment and Big Game Hunters crew bonus. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
tran_text: 使用 STRYK 手槍， AK 步槍， GL40 榴彈發射器，工具升級，步哨槍裝置及 Big Game Hunters 隊伍獎勵，要完成這項挑戰，你必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: Beat COUNTERFEIT on hard difficulty or above without killing any law enforcers or civilians. To complete this challenge, everyone in your crew will have to have played the heist from the start.
tran_text: 在 hard 或以上的難度，在沒殺死任何條子或市民下完成偽鈔風雲，要完成這項挑戰，你的隊伍必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: On COUNTERFEIT, manage to defuse all C4 charges.
tran_text: 在偽鈔風雲中，解除所有 C4 炸藥。

orig_text: Beat HEAT STREET on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
tran_text: 在 OVERKILL 145+ 難度下完成熱火街頭，要完成這項挑戰，你必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: Beat PANIC ROOM on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
tran_text: 在 OVERKILL 145+ 難度下完成戰慄空間，要完成這項挑戰，你必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: Lots of pigs, but no pigs
Beat DIAMOND HEIST on OVERKILL 145+ difficulty. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
tran_text: 在 OVERKILL 145+ 難度下完成鑽石劫掠，要完成這項挑戰，你必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: Reach level 145. This gives you the presidential masks for further campaigning.
tran_text: 到達 145 級，這會給你總統面具繼續玩。

orig_text: Complete NO MERCY on hard or OVERKILL without any civilian raising the alarm. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
tran_text: 沒有市民報警下完成 hard 或 OVERKILL 難度的慈愛醫院，要完成這項挑戰，你必須從頭至尾都在場上。

orig_text: Complete NO MERCY on OVERKILL difficulty, having sawed open all three ICU security doors. To complete this challenge, you will have to have played the heist from the start.
tran_text: 在 OVERKILL 難度下的慈愛醫院，鋸開所有深切治療部門，要完成這項挑戰，你必須從頭至尾都在場上。
